CustomField.description: This is the calculated start date for the task. It is the dependent start date if that exists otherwise it is the autonomous start date (The date the creator of the task wants to get started)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The calculated start date of the Project Task, derived from the Cannot Start Before date, or if this is a dependent task then the Project Task will start after the all the parents have ended.
CustomField.label: Calculated Start Date
